mapper.select: SELECT sq_no , sq_category , sq_title , sq_mem_id , TO_CHAR(sq_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sq_reg_date , sq_answer_yn , sq_writer FROM SITEQUESTION ORDER BY sq_no DESC

SELECT sq_no , sq_category , sq_title , sq_mem_id , TO_CHAR(sq_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sq_reg_date , sq_answer_yn , sq_writer FROM SITEQUESTION WHERE sq_writer = #{userName} ORDER BY sq_no DESC

SELECT sq_no , sq_category , sq_title , sq_mem_id , sq_writer , TO_CHAR(sq_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sq_reg_date , TO_CHAR(sq_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sq_mod_date , sq_content , b.sa_content as sa_content , b.sa_no as sa_no , b.sa_sq_no as sa_sq_no , TO_CHAR(b.sa_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sa_reg_date , 'SITEQUESTION' AS sq_type FROM SITEQUESTION a LEFT join SITEANSWER b on (a.sq_no = b.sa_sq_no) WHERE sq_no = #{xxx}
